properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating final flight of the Hindenburg on May 6, 1937, in Lakehurst, New Jersey, U.S.A., with LZ-129 “Hindenburg” airship; cancellation stamp dated May 6, 1984 in Lakehurst; includes information on reverse.
